Pre-Game Insights: Canada face Lionel Messi and Argentina in the semifinal of a Copa América with a spot in the final on the line.
Canada, as such, will enter this match as the overwhelming underdog.
Canada’s rise at this competition has been perhaps best personified by Jacob Shaffelburg.
Lautauro Martínez has taken the tournament by storm, scoring a competition-leading four goals.
Canada’s projected lineup includes Stephen Eustáquio, Alphonso Davies, and Ismaël Koné.
Argentina’s projected lineup features Lionel Messi, Lautauro Martínez, and Emiliano Martínez.
